name: RageGolf
description:
This is a notoriously hard game and hard to beat and rage inducing

Drag and release to shoot the ball. Your goal is to get to the top where the golf hole is. You need to go througth all the 13 zones without falling back down. So far no one have completed it.

Good luck!

P.S. Please contact me on itch if you find any bug :)
